title: LeaverBuster unfair
body: Well I was in a game then I dc for some reason (LOL crashed) so I tried to reconnect but I couldn't finally when I gave up I found out today that I got a 20 min ban for 5 GAMES!!! I found this very frustrating that we have to wait 20 mins for something we couldn't help please RIOT I would like some help please.

replies.body:
Hey somewhatme123, 

I have been in the same predicament as you and understand your frustration. The thing is when we disconnect no matter what the issue may be we're leaving our team in a terrible predicament, especially if we're in a ranked game. I know I get angry when a team member goes AFK or DC's and I bet you can relate too. The thing is Leaverbuster stacks up after so many disconnections or AFK's. You may want to try Riot's connection KB, which I have used and work's wonders, to try and bring the amount of DC's to a minimal amount or none at all. 

Connection KB: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues

Leaverbuster faq: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ

I just wanna help you out. I'll be on for awhile so if you have any questions i'll try and help you the best way I can.
